attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: its too much to leave a £30,000 a year job and go on to £46 per week so if people got what they earned for five years it would enable a lot of our elderly people to be properly looked after instead of being dumped into care homes and being looked after by people who dont earn a great deal and who dont really care about your relatives and there comfort... the care allowance is slavery in all its forms  £40 odd pound a week for 60hours now thats what i call slave wages and this goverment is responsible for paying that amount

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
